text:
Welcome to this study



Prior to the main task we ask that you complete some basic demographic information.
Following this you will be presented with a series of distorted images. We ask that you attempt to guess what each image may be and type your answer in the box provided. You will have 10 seconds to make a guess once the picture has been presented.
Once you have made a guess you will be asked to rate your confidence in the answer you have provided and your curiosity towards the correct answer.
After this you will be presented with the undistorted image.
Following this we ask that you complete some questionnaires about your characteristics/beliefs.
Finally, please remember, we ask that you pay careful attention to the pictures and read all text thoroughly.

Please press Proceed when you are ready to begin the experiment.
This is the start of a new experiment.

Thank you for completing this section of the study



We now ask that you fill in the questionnaires on the following pages.

Please press Proceed when you are ready to begin.
